Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Earned first career win on 4/12/2019...
Had first career hit on 4/29/2019, off Stephen Ensminger (WAS)...
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/4/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $11,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/9/2021 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
